verses.verse: Be <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of me, <S%G2531>just<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> am of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G1867>praise<s%> you <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G3403>remember<s%> me in <S%G3956>everything,<s%> and <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>firmly<s%> to the <S%G3862>traditions,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as I <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them to you.

But I <S%G2309>want<s%> you to <S%G3609>understand<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and the <S%G435>man<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of a <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> [something] on his <S%G2776>head<s%> while <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4395>prophesying,<s%> <S%G2617>disgraces<s%> his <S%G2776>head.<s%>

But <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> who has her <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G177>uncovered<s%> while <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4395>prophesying,<s%> <S%G2617>disgraces<s%> her <S%G2776>head;<s%> for she is <S%G1520>one<s%> and the <S%G846>same<s%> with her whose head is <S%G3587>shaved.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> does not <S%G2619>cover<s%> her head, let her <S%G2532>also<s%> have her <S%G2751>hair<s%> <S%G2751>cut<s%> <S%G2751>off;<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> it is <S%G150>disgraceful<s%> for a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to have her <S%G2751>hair<s%> <S%G2751>cut<s%> <S%G2751>off<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> her head <S%G3587>shaved,<s%> let her <S%G2619>cover<s%> her head.

For a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> not to have his <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G2619>covered,<s%> since he is the <S%G1504>image<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman<s%> is the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G435>man.<s%>
For <S%G435>man<s%> does not <S%G1510>originate<s%> from <S%G1135>woman,<s%> but <S%G1135>woman<s%> from <S%G435>man;<s%>
for <S%G2532>indeed<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> was not <S%G2936>created<s%> for the <S%G1135>woman<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake,<s%> but woman for the man's <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> [a symbol of] <S%G1849>authority<s%> on her <S%G2776>head,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G32>angels.<s%>

<S%G4133>However,<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> is <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5565>independent<s%> of <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> is <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G5565>independent<s%> of <S%G1135>woman.<s%>

For as the <S%G1135>woman<s%> originates from the <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G435>man<s%> [has his birth] <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1135>woman;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> originate from <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G2919>Judge<s%> for <S%G4771>yourselves<s%><S%G846>:<s%> is it <S%G4241>proper<s%> for a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> [with head] <S%G177>uncovered<s%>?

Does not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> you that <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2863>has<s%> <S%G2863>long<s%> <S%G2863>hair,<s%> it is a <S%G819>dishonor<s%> to him,

but <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2863>has<s%> <S%G2863>long<s%> <S%G2863>hair,<s%> it is a <S%G1391>glory<s%> to her? For her <S%G2864>hair<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> to her for a <S%G4018>covering.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> is <S%G1380>inclined<s%> to be <S%G5380>contentious,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5108>other<s%> <S%G4914>practice,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> have the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But in <S%G3853>giving<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3853>instruction,<s%> I do not <S%G1867>praise<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> not for the <S%G2909>better<s%> but for the <S%G7090>worse.<s%>

For, in the <S%G4413>first<s%> place, when you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> as a <S%G1577>church,<s%> I <S%G191>hear<s%> that <S%G4978>divisions<s%> <S%G5225>exist<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you; and in <S%G3313>part,<s%> I <S%G4100>believe<s%> it.

For there <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G139>factions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G1384>approved<s%> may have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5318>evident<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> when you <S%G4905>meet<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%><S%G3588>,<s%> <S%G846><s%> it is not to <S%G2068>eat<s%> the Lord's <S%G1173>Supper,<s%>

for in your <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G4301>takes<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1173>supper<s%> <S%G4301>first;<s%> and <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G3983>hungry<s%> and <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1161><s%> is <S%G3184>drunk.<s%>

<S%G1063>What!<s%> Do you not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3614>houses<s%> in which to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> do you <S%G2706>despise<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2617>shame<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>nothing<s%>? <S%G5101>What<s%> shall I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you? Shall I <S%G1867>praise<s%> you? In <S%G3778>this<s%> I will not <S%G1867>praise<s%> you.

For I <S%G3880>received<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to you, that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in the <S%G3571>night<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> He was <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread;<s%>

and when He had <S%G2168>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G2806>broke<s%> it, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is My <S%G4983>body,<s%> which is for you; <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> in <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of Me."

In the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>way<s%> [He took] the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1172>supper,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> is the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> in My <S%G129>blood;<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> as <S%G3740>often<s%> as you <S%G4095>drink<s%> [it,] in <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of Me."

For as <S%G3740>often<s%> as you <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G4221>cup,<s%> you <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> the Lord's <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> He <S%G2064>comes.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4095>drinks<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in an <S%G371>unworthy<s%> <S%G371>manner,<s%> shall be <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> and the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
But let a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1381>examine<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> let him <S%G2068>eat<s%> of the <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup.<s%>

For he who <S%G2068>eats<s%> and <S%G4095>drinks,<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> and <S%G4095>drinks<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> if he does not <S%G1252>judge<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> rightly.
For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you are <S%G772>weak<s%> and <S%G732>sick,<s%> and a <S%G2425>number<s%> <S%G2837>sleep.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G1252>judged<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> rightly, we should not be <S%G2919>judged.<s%>

But when we are <S%G2919>judged,<s%> we are <S%G3811>disciplined<s%> by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that we may not be <S%G2632>condemned<s%> <S%G4862>along<s%> with the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then,<s%> my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> when you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> to <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G1551>wait<s%> for <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> is <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> let him <S%G2068>eat<s%> at <S%G3624>home,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that you may not <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> for <S%G2917>judgment.<s%> And the <S%G3062>remaining<s%> matters I shall <S%G1299>arrange<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>
